overall_user_prompt_summary: User asked to test the 'mistake add' functionality.
overall_llm_action_summary: LLM attempted to create a sample mistake entry and add it to the log.

mistake_description: The LLM initially forgot to create the sample entry file.
This was a minor oversight during a test procedure.
expected_behavior_points: A sample_mistake_entry.json should be created before trying to add it.
actual_behavior_points: The 'add' command would have failed if the sample file didn't exist.

correction_strategy_points: Ensure all prerequisite files are created before running dependent commands.
